turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to order some pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See, I need to get four pizzas, so let's do the first one with pepperoni, the second one barbecue chicken, let's do the third one cheese, and then in the forth one let's do Italian sausage, jalapeños, and onion.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want these pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They all need to be large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 bbq chicken, 1 cheese, and one italian sausage, jalapenos, and onions, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right. Could I actually add anchovies onto the pepperoni?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll add that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $96, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a free pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be delivered to you and your order will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Can I also I forgot to mention, can I have those as all thin crust, as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me go back and edit that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be the same price and the pickup time should remain the same.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
